---
title: "get_empty_budgets"
output: html_document
date: "2024-07-08"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(RSelenium)
```

```{r}
empty_budgets <- read_csv("empty_budgets.csv")

first_words <- sapply(strsplit(empty_budgets$agency_name, " "), function(x) x[1])

empty_budgets$html <- paste0("https://policescorecard.org/", tolower(empty_budgets$state), "/police-department/",
                             first_words)


```
